name: tsutomu7/opt-python Docker container
readme:
Python3.5 and optimization packages. [![](https://badge.imagelayers.io/tsutomu7/opt-python:latest.svg)](https://imagelayers.io/?images=tsutomu7/opt-python:latest)
======

- Japanese font(IPAexGothic) is default in matplotlib.
- 132 packages are installed.

dockerfile:
FROM tsutomu7/scientific-python

ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
RUN conda install -y --channel https://conda.anaconda.org/cachemeorg funcdesigner openopt && \
    pip install --no-cache openopt mypulp myopenopt && \
    find /opt -name __pycache__ | xargs rm -r && \
    sudo rm -rf /opt/conda/pkgs/*
CMD ["/bin/bash"]

run: conda install -y --channel https://conda.anaconda.org/cachemeorg funcdesigner openopt &&     pip install --no-cache openopt mypulp myopenopt &&     find /opt -name __pycache__ | xargs rm -r &&     sudo rm -rf /opt/conda/pkgs/*
